summary: Provide the performance metrics of the current seller, such as positive seller rating, ship on time, etc
description: Provide the performance metrics of the current seller, such as positive seller rating, ship on time, etc.

query.name: language
query.description: Optional ISO 639-1 standard language code (default: en-US, supported languages: en-US, zh-CN, ms-MY, th-TH, vi-VN, id-ID).

common.name: app_key
common.description: Unique app ID issued by LAZADA Open Platform console when you apply for an app category

common.name: timestamp
common.description: The time stamp of the request e.g. 1517820392000 (which translates to 5 February 2018 08:46:32) with less than 7200s difference from UTC time

common.name: sign_method
common.description: The HMAC hash algorithm you are using to calculate your signature

request_examples.code:
client = LazopApiClient::Client.new(url, appkey, appSecret)
request = LazopApiClient::Request.new('/seller/performance/get')
request.add_api_parameter("language", "en-US")
response = client.execute(request, accessToken)
puts response.success?
puts response.body

client = lazop.LazopClient(url, appkey ,appSecret)
request = lazop.LazopRequest('/seller/performance/get')
request.add_api_param('language', 'en-US')
response = client.execute(request, access_token)
print(response.type)
print(response.body)

schema.name: success
schema.description: true for success, false for error.
